ProcessTemplates.Name: CSV file from SFTP server to Microsoft SQL Database UPDATE
ProcessTemplates.Description:
This process will retrieve a **CSV file** from the specified **SFTP** server.
It will take the contents of the file and use it to  create an **MicrosoftSQL Database** update statement. It will then execute the statement on the specified **MicrosoftSQL  Database**
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"FilePath":{"Value":"\"/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Path to CSV input data file."},"FileName":{"Value":"\"example.csv\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of CSV input data file."},"ServerAddress":{"Value":"\"127.0.0.1\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server address"},"ServerUser":{"Value":"\"user\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server user."},"ServerPassword":{"Value":"\"password\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"SFTP server user's password."},"ConnectionString":{"Value":"\"Server=myServerAddress;Database=myDataBase;User Id=myUsername;Password=myPassword;\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Database connection string."},"RowIndentifier":{"Value":"\"email\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Column name in dthe database that identifies individual rows."},"TableName":{"Value":"\"table\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of database table to be updated"}}

Process.Name: CSV file from SFTP server to Microsoft SQL Database UPDATE
Process.Description:
This process will retrieve a **CSV file** from the specified **SFTP** server.
It will take the contents of the file and use it to  create an **MicrosoftSQL Database** update statement. It will then execute the statement on the specified **MicrosoftSQL  Database**
